To demonstrate the feasibility of providing quick­ reaction emergency communications to areas iso­ lated by disaster or geographic conditions. CTS will be used to interconnect a base earth station with a remote highly portable terminal which has been dropped or transported to an area of simulated emergency. The link will be capable of providing two-way TV and/or voice.
